author: Charles R. Swindoll
title: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it
quotes: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
The secret of living a life of excellence is merely a matter of thinking thoughts of excellence. Really, it's a matter of programming our minds with the kind of information that will set us free.

author: Saumuel Beckett
title: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
quotes: If you do not love me I shall not be loved If I do not love you I shall not love.
We are all born mad. Some remain so.
